All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Canvas
Canvas is a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.
CanvasPane
CanvasPane is essentially a JPanel with added capability to refresh the image drawn on it.
Circle
A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
Figure
Parent class that contains the methods that can be used in the figures
FigureActions
This interface is to be implemented in the figure class with certain necessary methods.
FigureFactory
The FigureFactory class provides the call of constructors to interact with the user.
Pentagon
A pentagon that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
Runner
The Runner class provides a simple interactive menu for managing geometric figures.
ShapeDescription
ShapeDescription is essentially a JPanel with added capability to refresh the image drawn on it.
Square
A square that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
Triangle
A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
